author: Joshua Barrie
title: Single man fakes having a girlfriend in outrageously convincing photos
text:
Single man fakes having a girlfriend in outrageously convincing photos No woman just a guy Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Today is Valentine's Day. That's right, it's February 14. Love is in the air, lads are trawling Tinder, Burger King is selling kinky sex toys, and Subway is giving away six inches of sandwich to anyone willing to splash out on a drink. 
You know, though, that some people don't have a significant other. So Valentine's Day is just like any other â€“ well, worse, actually, given all the soapy social media posts and overpriced teddy bears bouncing around all over the place. 
Amid all this, one man has taken the 'fake it 'til you make it' ideal and made it his own. Social media star Rain Cavalry Yokohama has devised a series of cunning tricks that reveal how to fake a relationship. If that's your thing. Look at the talent
